title: !!ringling brothers!!
content:
what's the next best thing to this fun type?

or any other fun circus-y font ideas would be greatly welcomed.

best,  
liz

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303081843im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GLI0000083_Veer_5669.JPG)
author: lizthiem

comments.content:
A search at myfonts turns up a lot of circusy fonts

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=circus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303081843/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=circus "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=circus")

Clowns are scary.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John\_Wayne\_Gacy](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303081843/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Wayne_Gacy "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John\_Wayne\_Gacy")
Wow, that has to hurt, look at how his foot is turned upwards on his crossed leg.
